text: Deepak Lohar is an actor who mostly acts in Nagpuri and Hindi films. He is graduate from National School of Drama. He is known for the films Jharkhand Kar Chhaila, Chamku, Ilaka Kishoreganj and Namaha Shivaya Shantaya. == Filmography == {| class=wikitable |+Key |style="background:#FFFFCC;"| |Denotes films that have not yet been released |} {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !scope="col" | Year !scope="col" | Film !scope="col" | Role !scope="col" | Language !scope="col" | Notes |- | 2008 |Jharkhand Kar Chhaila | Birsa | Nagpuri | Best male actor |- | rowspan="" |2008 |Chamku | Assassin | Hindi | |- |2009 |Namah Shivaya Shantaya |Kaungkali | Hindi | |- |2011 |Karma | | Nagpuri | |- |2018 |Ilaka Kishoreganj |Tony | Hindi | |- |2019 |style="background:#FFFFCC;"| Dadagiri | | Nagpuri | |} ==Awards== {| class="wikitable" |- !
